articles.author: Teresa Wright
articles.title: How Canada's UNDRIP bill was strengthened to reject 'racist' doctrine of discovery - CTV News
articles.description: When European explorers first set foot on the lands that are now Canada, they claimed the territory as their own, despite the presence of Indigenous Peoples who had already been occupying the lands for generations.
articles.content:

articles.title: How the UK's travel regulations fell behind the rest of Europe - CNN
articles.description: The UK "traffic light system" of green, amber and red list countries was meant to open up travel. Instead, it has created "chaos," say industry insiders.

articles.title: Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums after EU car insurance probe - BreakingNews.ie

articles.content:
